thread.title_full: Head to Publix for 47¢ Yoplait Go-Gurt 8-Packs! :: Southern Savers

author: Jenny
title: Head to Publix for 47¢ Yoplait Go-Gurt 8-Packs! :: Southern Savers
text: Welcome to Southern Savers, where finding deals and steals is simple and rewarding! See I told you, this would help! [Coupon Abbreviations](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) - SC = Store Coupon - MC = Manufacturer Coupon - SS = Smart Source - RMN = Retail Me Not - PG = Proctor and Gamble [Coupon Terms](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) - WYB = When You Buy - B1G1 = Buy One Get One Free - .75/1 = 75 cents off one item - .75/3 = 75 cents off three items - EXP = Expiration Date Going Nuts? I can help you understand [coupon terms](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) and [abbreviations](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) [Home](https://www.southernsavers.com/) > [Printable Coupons](https://www.southernsavers.com/printable-coupons/) > Head to Publix for 47¢ Yoplait Go-Gurt 8-Packs! This post may contain affiliate links. Read our disclosure [here](http://www.southernsavers.com/disclosure-policy/). Save on a snacking favorite this week! Use an [Ibotta rebate](https://ibotta.sjv.io/MyxeK) and an [eCoupon](https://www.publix.com/savings/coupons/digital-coupons) at the Publix B1G1 sale to get Yoplait Go-Gurt for just 47¢ per box. Publix Yoplait Go-Gurt Deal (ends 1/9 or 1/10): - Yoplait Go-Gurt Portable Yogurt or Simply Go-Gurt 8-20 pk, B1G1 starting at $3.44 ($1.72) -.50/1 Yoplait Go-Gurt, 8-ct+, limit 5, Ibotta [mobile app](https://ibotta.com/) -$1.50/2 Yoplait Yogurt Multipks 4-12 ct, Go-GURT®, Kids Cup Yogurt 8CT, OR Trix™ Yogurt 8CT, Publix [eCoupon](https://www.publix.com/savings/coupons/digital-coupons) (makes it 47¢) See more great deals at [Publix](https://www.southernsavers.com/publix-weekly-ad-deals/).
